DOCNAME: CASE OF GYOZO NAGY v. HUNGARY
JUDGES: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was charged with fraud and forging documents . On DATE ORG found him guilty . On appeal , the Borsod - Abaúj - Zemplén County ORG quashed this decision and remitted the case to the first - instance court on DATE .
CARDINAL . In the resumed proceedings , ORG acquitted the applicant on DATE . This judgment was quashed by ORG on DATE .
CARDINAL . In the resumed proceedings , ORG found the applicant guilty on DATE . On appeal , ORG reversed this judgment and finally acquitted the applicant on DATE .
